"},{"lineNumber":116582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜べしべしべしべしっ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<smack smack smack smack>"},{"lineNumber":116583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、なんじゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what is it!\""},{"lineNumber":116584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷいすっ、知らないです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pui, I don't know."},{"lineNumber":116585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火炎ちゃんの優しさに感謝して欲しいです。","translatedEnglishLine":" I want you to appreciate Kaen-chan's kindness."},{"lineNumber":116586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぷんすか」","translatedEnglishLine":" Pouty.\""},{"lineNumber":116587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah..."},{"lineNumber":116588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これからは、その、一緒に……」","translatedEnglishLine":" From now on, um, together..."},{"lineNumber":116589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……う、うう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...U-uhh\""},{"lineNumber":116590,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニミッツがドキドキしながら","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz walked nervously,"},{"lineNumber":116591,"originalJapaneseLine":"城内を歩いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"through the castle."},{"lineNumber":116592,"originalJapaneseLine":"（図書室……図書室に行くだけ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(The library... just going to the library...)"},{"lineNumber":116593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、あの子……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, that girl...\""},{"lineNumber":116594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああ……あの魔人の……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yeah... that demon...\""},{"lineNumber":116595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!?\""},{"lineNumber":116596,"originalJapaneseLine":"（や、やっぱり、私が外に出るなんて","translatedEnglishLine":"(I knew it, me going outside was"},{"lineNumber":116597,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おこがましかったんだわ……！）","translatedEnglishLine":" presumptuous...!)"},{"lineNumber":116598,"originalJapaneseLine":"（み、みんなが私を疎ましがってる……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Everyone despises me...!)"},{"lineNumber":116599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":116600,"originalJapaneseLine":"思わずニミッツは逃げるように","translatedEnglishLine":"Without thinking, Nimitz ran away"},{"lineNumber":116601,"originalJapaneseLine":"走り去っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"as if fleeing."},{"lineNumber":116602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya!?\""},{"lineNumber":116603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっと、どうしたニミッツ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, what's wrong, Nimitz?\""},{"lineNumber":116604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、ランス、さん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-a, Rance-san...\""},{"lineNumber":116605,"originalJapaneseLine":"今まで恐怖に怯えていたニミッツの表情が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz's expression, which had been fearful until now,"},{"lineNumber":116606,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほんの少しだけ軽いものになる。","translatedEnglishLine":"lightened just a little."},{"lineNumber":116607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど、みんなに嫌われてる気がすると」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, you feel like everyone hates you.\""},{"lineNumber":116608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes..."},{"lineNumber":116609,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元々、私は魔人で敵でしたから……","translatedEnglishLine":" I was originally a demon and an enemy..."},{"lineNumber":116610,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここにいちゃいけないんじゃないかって……」","translatedEnglishLine":" So I thought I shouldn't be here...\""},{"lineNumber":116611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ニミッツは真面目だなあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nimitz is so serious.\""},{"lineNumber":116612,"originalJapaneseLine":"「安心しろ、可愛い子は無罪だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't worry, cute girls are innocent.\""},{"lineNumber":116613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":116614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ということは……ブスの私は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then... as for ugly me..."},{"lineNumber":116615,"originalJapaneseLine":"　や、やっぱり、死刑……」","translatedEnglishLine":" I, I guess, am sentenced to death after all...\""},{"lineNumber":116616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんでも悪い方に受け取る子だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You always take everything the worst way, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":116617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいか、ニミッツ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen, Nimitz."},{"lineNumber":116618,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確かに昔は戦ったかも知れん。","translatedEnglishLine":" You might have fought against us in the past."},{"lineNumber":116619,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、今は仲間だ」","translatedEnglishLine":" But now, you're a comrade.\""},{"lineNumber":116620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、ノープロブレム。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, no problem."},{"lineNumber":116621,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気にすることはない」","translatedEnglishLine":" There's nothing to worry about.\""},{"lineNumber":116622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……大体、そういう話を始めると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Generally, when that topic comes up,"},{"lineNumber":116623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラ辺りがとびっきりアウトだしな」","translatedEnglishLine":" Satella around here is the biggest outlier anyway.\""},{"lineNumber":116624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...\""},{"lineNumber":116625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前は強ーい魔人なんだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're a strong demon,"},{"lineNumber":116626,"originalJapaneseLine":"　文句言ってくる奴にはビシッと言ってやればいい」","translatedEnglishLine":" so you should sharply tell off anyone who complains.\""},{"lineNumber":116627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それで大概上手くいく」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That usually works out well.\""},{"lineNumber":116628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、ニミッツがやりたくないなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, if Nimitz doesn't want to do it,"},{"lineNumber":116629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺が殺してやってもいいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":" I can kill them for you.\""},{"lineNumber":116630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それは、ちょっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-that's a bit...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎ちゃんの優しさに感謝して欲しいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to appreciate Kaen-chan's kindness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからは、その、一緒に……」
ニミッツがドキドキしながら

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The library... just going to the library...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （や、やっぱり、私が外に出るなんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I knew it, me going outside was

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おこがましかったんだわ……！）
（み、みんなが私を疎ましがってる……！）
思わずニミッツは逃げるように
今まで恐怖に怯えていたニミッツの表情が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz's expression, which had been fearful until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんの少しだけ軽いものになる。
「なるほど、みんなに嫌われてる気がすると」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, you feel like everyone hates you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々、私は魔人で敵でしたから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was originally a demon and an enemy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにいちゃいけないんじゃないかって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I thought I shouldn't be here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「安心しろ、可愛い子は無罪だ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, I guess, am sentenced to death after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんでも悪い方に受け取る子だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You always take everything the worst way, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確かに昔は戦ったかも知れん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You might have fought against us in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……大体、そういう話を始めると、
サテラ辺りがとびっきりアウトだしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella around here is the biggest outlier anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は強ーい魔人なんだから、
文句言ってくる奴にはビシッと言ってやればいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you should sharply tell off anyone who complains."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、ニミッツがやりたくないなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, if Nimitz doesn't want to do it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が殺してやってもいいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can kill them for you."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
